comments.author: dbaron@dbaron.org
comments.creator: dbaron@dbaron.org
comments.raw_text:
This is a meta-bug to track our support for css3-background:
  http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-background/
  http://dev.w3.org/csswg/css3-background/ (editor's draft)

This bug will be marked as "Depends on" bugs that are needed to complete implementation of css3-background.  The dependency tree can be used to view a list of these dependencies.

Please do not add comments about specific issues to this bug; they belong in their own bugs.
